resources.string: An undergraduate student in University of Michigan - Shanghai Jiao Tong University Joint Institute, majored in Computer Science.
An undergraduate student in School of Naval Architecture, Ocean and Civil Engineering, majored in Engineering Mechanics.
An undergraduate student in School of Electronic Information and Electrical Engineering, majored in Electrical Engineering.

This is one of the innovation projects of college students. We build this application to help people, especially those researchers and students, to get attributes of alloys easily. Moreover, users can add attributes of alloys if they find something the app doesn\'t include. Users can also star alloys if they want to tag them. The sort function is also included in this app.

Our team consists of four students, who are Xiao Changsheng, Shen Feiyu, Tang Wenhao, and Zhu Jianan. Xiao Changsheng is the leader of our team, and his job is to collect attributes of alloys. The other three students are the developers of this app. For their information, you can see in \"Develops\".
Fall in love at first sight
